span.span: Describes a committable transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CommittableTransaction` 类为应用程序使用事务提供了一种显式方法，而不是隐式地使用 类。The `CommittableTransaction` class provides an explicit way for applications to use a transaction, as opposed to using the class implicitly. 与 类不同，应用程序编写器需要明确调用 和 方法以提交或中止事务。Unlike the class, the application writer needs to specifically call the and methods in order to commit or abort the transaction. 但是，只有事务的创建者才能提交事务。However, only the creator of a transaction can commit the transaction. 因此，通过 方法获取的可提交事务的副本不可提交。Therefore, copies of a committable transaction obtained through the method are not committable. > [!NOTE] > 建议使用 类创建隐式事务，以便自动管理环境事务上下文。We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you. 还应将 和 类用于需要跨多个函数调用或多个线程调用使用同一事务的应用程序。You should also use the and classes for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls. 有关此模型的详细信息，请参阅[使用事务范围实现隐式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope)主题。For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) topic. 创建 不会自动设置环境事务，这是代码在其中执行的事务。Creating a does not automatically set the ambient transaction, which is the transaction your code executes in. 可以通过调用全局 对象的静态 属性来获取或设置环境事务。You can get or set the ambient transaction by calling the static property of the global object. 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅[使用事务范围实现隐式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope)主题中的 "使用 TransactionScopeOption 管理事务流" 一节。For more information on ambient transactions, see the " Managing Transaction Flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) topic. 如果未设置环境事务，则资源管理器上的任何操作都不是该事务的一部分。If the ambient transaction is not set, any operation on a resource manager is not part of that transaction. 需要显式设置和重置环境事务，以确保资源管理器在正确的事务上下文中运行。You need to explicitly set and reset the ambient transaction to ensure that resource managers operate under the right transaction context. 在提交 之前，该事务涉及的所有资源仍将被锁定。Until a has been committed, all the resources involved with the transaction are still locked. 对象不能被重用。A object cannot be reused. 一旦提交或回滚，就不能在事务中再次使用，也不能将其设置为当前环境事务上下文。Once it has been committed or rolled back, it cannot be used again in a transaction or set as the current ambient transaction context.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

related.span: 使用事务范围实现隐式事务

span.span: Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope

summary.span: 开始异步提交事务的尝试。

span.span: Begins an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

returns.span: 一个 接口，该接口可由调用方用于检查异步操作的状态，或用于等待操作完成。

span.span: An interface that can be used by the caller to check the status of the asynchronous operation, or to wait for the operation to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将在事务完成之前立即返回。This method returns immediately, before the transaction has been completed. 然后，事务在不同的线程上提交，并在完成后调用 `asyncCallback` 委托。The transaction then commits on a different thread, and the `asyncCallback` delegate is invoked when it has completed. 调用此方法后，在调用 之前，不会接收到事务的结果。After this method is called, you do not receive the outcome of the transaction until you call . > [!NOTE] > 提交过程可能在此方法调用中同步完成。The commit process may complete synchronously inside this method call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to commit the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，将轮询已注册到事务中的所有对象，并可单独指示它们对提交或回滚事务的投票。When this method is called, all objects that have registered to participate in the transaction are polled and can independently indicate their vote to either commit or roll back the transaction. 如果任何参与者投票要回滚事务，则会回滚该事务，并且此方法会引发 异常。If any participant votes to roll back the transaction, it is rolled back and this method throws a exception. 这是事务的正常出现，你的代码应捕获并处理此类异常。This is a normal occurrence for a transaction and your code should catch and process such exceptions. 和 会一直阻止，直到完成事务处理的第一个阶段。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一阶段在事务中的所有资源管理器和登记已经对事务结果进行了投票之后结束，并且 持久决定提交或中止事务。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 处理过程的第二个阶段始终是异步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，无法保证刚从给定事务中提交的数据在不使用另一个事务查看此数据时立即可用。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data. 由于此方法在事务处理的第一阶段完成之前一直处于阻止状态，因此在 Windows 窗体（WinForm）应用程序中使用此方法时应非常小心，否则会发生死锁。Because this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur. 如果在一个 WinForm 控制事件（例如单击按钮）中调用此方法，并使用同步 方法指示控件在处理事务过程中执行某些 UI 任务（例如，更改颜色），则会发生死锁。If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen. 这是因为 方法是同步的，并会阻止工作线程，直到 UI 线程完成其作业为止。This is because the method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job. 但是，在我们的方案中，UI 线程还会等待工作线程提交事务。However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction. 结果是，无可以继续，并且范围会无限期等待提交完成。The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish. 你应尽可能使用 而不是 ，因为它是异步的，因此不容易出现死锁。You should use rather than wherever possible, because it is asynchronous and thus less prone to deadlock.

summary.span: 结束异步提交事务的尝试。

span.span: Ends an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当完成与异步承诺关联的任何清理工作时，应在指定为 方法的参数的回调委托中调用此方法。You should call this method in the callback delegate specified as a parameter to the method, when you have finished any cleanup work associated with the asynchronous commitment. 你还可以提前调用此方法而无需等待委托。You can also call this method early without waiting for the delegate. 如果在调用此方法时，事务尚未完成，则此方法将等待其完成。If, by the time you call this method, the transaction has not completed, this method waits for its completion. > [!CAUTION] > `asyncResult` 返回的 属性始终 `false`，即使操作同步完成也是如此。The property returned by `asyncResult` is always `false`, even if the operation completed synchronously. 和 会一直阻止，直到完成事务处理的第一个阶段。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一阶段在事务中的所有资源管理器和登记已经对事务结果进行了投票之后结束，并且 持久决定提交或中止事务。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 处理过程的第二个阶段始终是异步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，无法保证刚从给定事务中提交的数据在不使用另一个事务查看此数据时立即可用。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data.

exception.span: 调用了 ，并且该事务第一次回滚。
